attributes.action: Scrap existing and proposed new Tyne Tunnel toll charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap existing and proposed new Tyne Tunnel toll charges."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18451


Prime Minister's Office
